thread.title: Dikembe Mutombo hangs with Kevin Harvick in Las Vegas
thread.title_full: Dikembe Mutombo hangs with Kevin Harvick in Las Vegas

title: Dikembe Mutombo hangs with Kevin Harvick in Las Vegas

organizations.name: national basketball association hall of famer dikembe mutombo

text:
Mar 10, 2017 at 5:02p ET 0Shares 
When your 7 feet, 2 inches tall, it’s hard to be inconspicuous. If you don’t believe it, just ask National Basketball Association Hall of Famer Dikembe Mutombo, who played for six NBA teams from 1991 to 2009. 
Mutombo is in Las Vegas this week, where he is hanging out with 2014 Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series champion Kevin Harvick. 
Earlier, the two made a television commercial in Charlotte for Mobil 1 Annual Protection, which is sponsoring Harvick’s No. 4 Stewart-Haas Racing Ford in Sunday’s Kobalt 400 at Las Vegas Motor Speedway. 
Friday at the track, Mutombo got to see NASCAR up close and personal in his first race. Check out the video.
